attributes.action: stop encouraging meaningless petitions on this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Using this website to give members of the public the opportunity to create meaningless petitions that will never lead to changes in policy or actions is at best a piece of PR chicanery and at worst giving the illusion of hope to those most in need.  We the undersigned acknowledge the irony of using this site to make this point but would like members of the public with a valid point to make to be encouraged to take it up through more meaningful channels which might actually make a difference, and all the lame-brained trolling timewasters wanting people to sign their half-baked rallying calls to be denied further recourse to this outlet for their jejune frustrations.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
